backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing two frontend feature updates related to uniform and armor variants and war-era ranks.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like text summarizing various frontend files and their roles in the copper-themed site.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining routes for home, ranks, divisions, lore, and history.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Shared layout with navigation, content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with desktop and mobile menus using TanStack Router links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Comprehensive Internet Identity auth provider and hook handling login, identity storage, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder hook file for future queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Copper-themed Tailwind design tokens defining light and dark palettes and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point wrapping the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BlankPage.tsx: Page component that intentionally renders nothing.
frontend/src/pages/DivisionsPage.tsx: Page rendering multiple Brotherhood divisions with icons, images, and descriptive text using Card components.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section and feature cards linking to major site sections like ranks and divisions.
frontend/src/pages/RanksPage.tsx: Page displaying detailed rank hierarchy with structured sections and cards for each rank category.
frontend/src/pages/UniformArmorVariantsB: Page outlining armor and uniform variants per rank using cards and bullet lists.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, architectural notes, requirements, and implemented features.
